slide.title: General Image Manipulation
slide.blurb: PHP supports a wide range of general manipulation functions for images, allowing you to copy all or portions of images, resize images, gather information about images, and more.

list.bullet: %imagecopy()% -- Copy all or a portion of one image onto another
%imagecopymerge()% -- Copies and merges a portion of one image onto another
%imagecopyresized()% -- Copy and scale a portion of one image onto another canvas
%imagecopyresampled()% -- Copy, scale, and resample one image onto another canvas
